text: Vojislav Koštunica (born 24 March 1944) is a former Serbian politician. He was the last President of FR Yugoslavia from 2000 to 2003, and the prime minister of Serbia in two terms from 2004 to 2007 and from 2007 to 2008. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Serbia and Montenegro Category:Prime ministers of Serbia Category:Politicians from Belgrade
title: Vojislav Koštunica
